title: Thales Alenia Space to supply NEO Surveyor communications equipment
summary: Thales Alenia Space will supply NEO Surveyor’s S-band transponder, K-band modulator and K-band travelling wave tube amplifier to transmit data 1.5 million kilometers between L1 and Earth.

title: Eutelsat scales back OneWeb Gen 2 upgrade plan
summary: Eutelsat has decided to hold off deploying significantly upgraded OneWeb broadband satellites to instead focus on adding continuity of service capacity for customers with long-term contracts, the French fleet operator said Feb. 16.

title: JAXA ready for second attempt to reach orbit with H3
summary: Japan’s H3 rocket will make a second attempt to reach orbit on Saturday, 11 months after it failed during its maiden flight. The rocket will send a mass simulator and two small satellites to the same 669-kilometer Sun-synchronous orbit it targeted on the previous mission. Liftoff is scheduled for 00:22 UTC (9:22 AM local time) from Launch Pad 2 of the Yoshinobu Launch Complex of the Tanegashima Space Center.

title: Lockheed Martin ramping up small satellite production
summary: The company has a backlog of 100 smallsats for defense and intelligence agencies

title: SpaceX launches 300th Falcon 9 rocket with successful Starlink mission
summary: SpaceX launched the Falcon 9 rocket for the 300th time after a successful Starlink mission on Thursday evening. It was a busy...
